pr_title: Add partition summaries in SnapshotSummary builder

timeline.message: Add partition summaries in SnapshotSummary builder.

timeline.bodyText: Is this because we don't know how many records an equality delete removes?
timeline.author: aokolnychyi

replies.bodyText: Actually, no. It is because we don't have row counts for the number of equality and positional deletes in delete manifests.
replies.author: aokolnychyi

timeline.bodyText: We still interpret this as the number of records in data files that were removed?
timeline.author: aokolnychyi
